titleStmt.title: Anti-Haman, or, An answer to Mr. G. Burnet's Mistery of iniquity unvailed wherein is shewed the conformity of the doctrine, worship, & practice of the Roman Catholick Church with those of the purest times : the idolatry of the pagans is truly stated ... / by W.E. ...
titleStmt.author: Warner, John, 1628-1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
